title: EcoNetGen: Simulate and Sample from Ecological Interaction Networks
description: Generate a wide range of random networks given expected degree, modularity, and structure. Simulations and sampling routines are implemented in FORTRAN,  providing efficient generation times even for large networks. Basic visualization methods also included.

creators.name: de Aguiar, Marcus A. M.
creators.affiliation: Universidade Estadual de Campinas, Unicamp, Campinas, São Paulo, Brazil
